  • JQuery tips and tricks – The second part of a nice tip roundup.

  • CSS3 screencast – Get on the wagon.
  • JQuery mimics of CSS3 – until all browsers will support CSS3, here are some solutions on how to mimic CSS3 techniques on JQuery.
